meanings.sent1: The isagogic chapter provided an overview of the main concepts.
meanings.sent2: The isagogic information at the beginning helped set the stage for the rest of the book.
meanings.sent3: The isagogic notes were so detailed that they felt like a mini-lecture.
meanings.sent4: Her isagogic approach to teaching made the complex topic easier to understand.
meanings.sent5: The isagogic introduction was like a friendly guide leading us into the subject.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to an introduction or introductory material
meanings.sent1: The isagogic section explained the basics before diving into the advanced topics.
meanings.sent2: His isagogic presentation clarified the key points for the audience.
meanings.sent3: The isagogic video was both informative and engaging.
meanings.sent4: In her isagogic speech, she laid out the groundwork for the discussion.
meanings.sent5: The isagogic handout was a helpful tool for new students to grasp the subject.
